amendment.description: To apply the sunset provision to the revenue increase provisions.

action.text: Amendment SA 639 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 639 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 170.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 639.
Amendment SA 639 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S6431-6432; text: CR S6432) To apply the sunset provision to the revenue increase provisions.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 639 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 170.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 639 proposed by Senator Sessions.
